# computeUnits

**Instance Property**

The processing unit or units the model uses to make predictions.

## Declaration

```swift
var computeUnits: MLComputeUnits { get set }
```

## Allowing access to processing units

- **MLComputeUnits**: The set of processing-unit configurations the model can use to make predictions.
